name: SonarJS
initializeCommand: T='${localEnv:TEMP:/tmp}'; if [[ "$T" != /* ]]; then cmd.exe /c "(if defined NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS (copy /Y \"%NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS%\" \"%TEMP%\dc-cert.crt\") else (type nul >\"%TEMP%\dc-cert.crt\")) & (if exist \"%USERPROFILE%\.npmrc\" (copy /Y \"%USERPROFILE%\.npmrc\" \"%TEMP%\dc-npmrc\") else (type nul >\"%TEMP%\dc-npmrc\"))"; else (cp "${NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS:-}" "$T/dc-cert.crt" 2>/dev/null || touch "$T/dc-cert.crt") && (cp ~/.npmrc "$T/dc-npmrc" 2>/dev/null || touch "$T/dc-npmrc"); fi
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /home/node/.certs && cat /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt $([ -f /tmp/corporate-ca.crt ] && echo /tmp/corporate-ca.crt) > /home/node/.certs/bundle.pem && mise trust && mise install && git submodule update --init --recursive && npm ci
